Command Utility API¶

class xnat_wrapper.command_utility.CommandUtility(xnat, project=None, commands={}, scans=[], sessions=[])¶

Class that provides methods to run commands on XNAT projects, sessions, and scans.

Parameters

  • xnat (class) – An open XNAT connection via pyxnat.Interface()

  • project (str, optional) – Name of the XNAT project, defaults to None

  • commands (dict, optional) – Dictionary of commands with the XNAT project level (i.e. project, session, or scan) as the keys and the command name and options as the values.

  • scans (list, optional) – A list of XNAT project scans

  • sessions (list, optional) – A list of XNAT project sessions

__init__(xnat, project=None, commands={}, scans=[], sessions=[])¶

Constructor method

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

check_bids_map()¶

Utility to check if a BIDS map exists within an XNAT project. If one does not exist, then one will be uploaded.

download_json_files(project=None, resource='')¶

Downloads data from JSON files located under an XNAT project and (optionally) filtered by a resource name

Parameters

  • project (str, optional) – The name of the XNAT project

  • resource (str, optional) – The name of the XNAT project resource

Returns

A list of JSON structures downloaded from JSON files located in under a specific XNAT project/resource.

Return type

list

find_and_run_command(exp_list, cmd, params={})¶

Function that runs a given XNAT command on a list of projects, sessions, of scans.

Parameters

  • exp_list (list) – A list of XNAT projects, sessions, or scans.

  • cmd (str) – The name of the command

  • params (dict, optional) – The optional parameters (or kwargs) that should be passed to the command

Returns

List of the command results including the its wrapper and container information

Return type

list

find_project_experiments(project=None)¶

Finds all of the sessions and scans under an XNAT project.

Parameters

project (str, optional) – The name of the XNAT project

get_container_info(url, params={})¶

Get XNAT container/plugin information and check that all required parameters are valid.

Parameters

params (dict, optional) – Parameters passed to the XNAT container API

Returns

XNAT container information with valid input parameters

Return type

dict or None

get_inputs(search_list)¶

Recursively search an XNAT function wrapper for inputs.

Parameters

search_list (list) – List of XNAT functions

Returns

XNAT function input information

Return type

dict

get_project_experiments(project=None)¶

Returns all of the sessions and scans in an XNAT project.

Parameters

project (str, optional) – The name of the XNAT project

Returns

Dictionary containing sessions and scans as keys with the respective lists of each as values.

Return type

dict

get_results()¶

Returns the results stored in the command utility object

Returns

Results from running XNAT command(s)

Return type

dict

get_wrapper_command(name, xsi)¶

Function that looks for a function in an XNAT project matching a name and XSI type.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the XNAT function

  • xsi (str) – The domain level of the XNAT function (e.g. xnat:mrScanData)

Returns

XNAT function wrapper including the API endpoint to call the function

Return type

dict or None

has_experiments(project=None)¶

Determines if a project has experiments (sessions and/or scans)

Parameters

project (str, optional) – The name of an XNAT project

Returns

True if the XNAT project has sessions/scans, otherwise False

Return type

bool

run_commands(project=None, commands=None)¶

Run a series of commands on XNAT projects, sessions, or scans.

Parameters

  • project (str, optional) – Name of the XNAT project

  • commands (dict, optional) – Dictionary of commands with the XNAT project level (i.e. project, session, or scan) as the keys and the command name and options as the values.

run_container(cmd, params)¶

Run an XNAT container/plugin on a project, session, or scan.

Parameters

  • cmd (str) – XNAT command API endpoint to run command

  • params (dict) – Parameters passed to the XNAT container API

Returns

Results of the command

Return type

dict

save_results(filename, indent=2)¶

Save results from commands to a JSON file

Parameters

  • filename (str) – Name of the JSON file to save to (.json extension not required)

  • indent (int, optional) – The amount of spacing/indentation to include while pretty-printing to output file

set_commands(commands)¶

Sets the commands for the command utility

Parameters

commands (dict) – Dictionary of commands with the XNAT project level (i.e. project, session, or scan) as the keys and the command name and options as the values.

set_project(project)¶

Sets the project name for the command utility

Parameters

project (str) – Name of the XNAT project
